ygData.subject: Re: Effect of Intelligence
ygData.msgSnippet: Nah..  you re ok.  There ARE some non-intelligent wizards in fantasy games...   mostly dead now...  but still, they exist.    =) I d probably restart though.
ygData.messageBody:
Nah.. you're ok. There ARE some non-intelligent wizards in fantasy games... mostly dead now... but still, they exist. =)

I'd probably restart though. hehe

Drev

> ----------
> From: L. Dugan[SMTP:ldugan@...]
> Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 1:58 PM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Effect of Intelligence
>
> From: "L. Dugan" <ldugan@...>
>
> Hi all,
>
> I was wondering if anyone has seen the effect of having (or not having)
> high intelligence. I kinda messed up and didn't really think through on
> what I should distribute my bonus points to. I have around 104 int, and
> put the rest of the bonus points in strength and some other, i don't
> remember.
>
> Currently, I'm at lvl 9, and was thinking of maybe starting over, while
> I'm at a fairly low level.
>
> Thanks,
>
> Lorenzo
> High Elf Wizard
> Fennin Ro
